headline.main: When the Afghans Are Free of War

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld, discussing Special Operations forces' monitoring of major roads in southern Afghanistan, is quoted as saying (front page, Nov. 15): ''You might catch some senior Al Qaeda leaders; you might catch some senior Taliban leaders. If they are the kind you want to shoot, you shoot them.'' If Americans favor this policy (and it seems that most do), perhaps our country should cease its hypocritical condemnation of Israel when its forces assassinate terrorists who lead and direct the suicide bombing of its civilians. JESS MANDEL Iowa City, Nov. 15, 2001
